channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s ‘big, beautiful bill’ advances in rare Sunday night vote, but conservatives want more cuts: ‘The bill does not yet meet the moment’
item.description: House Republicans narrowly advanced President Donald Trump's big tax cuts package out of a key committee during a rare Sunday night vote.

item.title: How smart CMOs are turning marketing into a launchpad to the corner office
item.description: Today, 37% of Fortune 500 CEOs have marketing experience somewhere along their path to the top.

item.title: Walmart’s warning of higher prices puts spotlight on ‘RIM accounting’ practice favored by big retailers
item.description: CFO John David Rainey said RIM accounting will accentuate tariff-induced financial swings.

item.title: Jamie Dimon says he’s not against remote workers—but they ‘will not tell JPMorgan what to do’
item.description: While Jamie Dimon has said there is a time and a place for remote and hybrid work, he says he won't be told by office-resistant staffers how to run JP...

item.title: U.K. and EU set to reveal new deal—opening up a new chapter after Brexit after ‘late breakthrough’
item.description: EU diplomats said on Monday a deal had been reached on resetting ties with the U.K. after late night talks to resolve differences on key sticking poin...

item.title: Yield on 30-year Treasury note climbs to 5.02% in wake of Moody's U.S. downgrade
El Erian: Too early to say if tariffs irreversibly damaged U.S. exceptionalism
Strong earnings keep stock-market bulls in charge, but what could end the rally?
